official_title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to decrease the number of loans made under section 502 of such Act and increase the regular payments made by borrowers under such loans.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to establish annual loan authority limits and minimum payments for specified rural housing loans.

titles.title: To amend the Housing Act of 1949 to decrease the number of loans made under section 502 of such Act and increase the regular payments made by borrowers under such loans.
